thread.title: Partially blocked fire escapes
thread.title_full: Partially blocked fire escapes - Review of Hotel Indigo London Tower Hill, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: shepwhites2016
title: Partially blocked fire escapes
text: Twice asked at front desk about Laundry in fire escapes. Duty manager on my first night there said she would get stuff shifted, hotel Manager (also their HSE manager) at checkout said it was not a problem, and he had checked it was OK with fire brigade and HSE... Personally I don't believe him. I don't think combustible materials should obstruct fire escapes. See attached photos and decide if you want to stay here.
